title: Ferrari Hires Tech Pioneer As CEO
itunes:title: Ferrari Hires Tech Pioneer As CEO
description:
Michael Dean, Senior European Autos Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses Ferrari's new CEO. Shannon Wilkinson, Founder and CEO of Tego Cyber, discusses recent ransomware attacks and the future of cybersecurity. Brad McMillan, Chief Investment Officer of Commonwealth Financial Network, discusses the markets and gives his mid-year outlook. Kevin Crowley, U.S. Oil Reporter for Bloomberg News, talks about the day's Big Take story: "The Retreat of Exxon and the Oil Majors Won't Stop Fossil Fuel." Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
